# R Packages

This thesis was produced using all the following R packages

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
#| message: false
#| cache: false
library(tidyverse)
library(grateful)
pkgs <- cite_packages(
  output = "table",
  out.dir = ".",
  omit = NULL,
  bib.file = "biblio/_packages"
)
knitr::kable(
  pkgs,
  caption = "Table of packages used in this book"
)
```
